whatever… in my memory on old rs when i first opened the beta i remember seeing the platebodies and thinking how crap they looked in comparison to the rsc ones and they did NOT look like that

whaterverrrrr[/quote]
Trollin’ + Gravedig - slipped my mind forgot I was on the 4th page. XD

item.title: Old Platebody and Rune Models (Before 317)
item.dc:creator: @revengr revengr
item.description:
@revengr wrote:

These models we’re taken from a 289 cache.
Why would I take the time to add sleeves to platebody models and claim that they’re old models?
Look at any beta picture you want.
If they have pictures of rune inventory models or platebody inventory models, they will look just like that.
These are not fake.

Read full topic

item.title: Old Platebody and Rune Models (Before 317)
item.dc:creator: @superstarz superstarz
item.description:
@superstarz wrote:

[quote=“revengr, post:1, topic:343024”]Before the Jagex graphics team was any good. (Jk)
I actually prefer these models to the ones in 317 clients, so I put these in there.
Equip models for the platebodies had no differences, so these are just inventory models.
Platebodies include Saradomin, Guthix, Zamorak, and White Platebodies (Even though white platebodies never had sleeves like this…).

0007-1.png765×503

Download
Mirror

317 Default Configs don’t fit the older models…
Here are the ones that do:

[code]if(i == 1115 || i == 1117 || i == 1119 || i == 1121 || i == 1123 || i == 1125 || i == 1127 || i == 2653 || i == 2661 || i == 2669 || i == 6617) //platebodies
{
class8.anInt181 = 1290;
class8.anInt194 = 14;
class8.anInt190 = 424;
}

if(i == 554 || i == 555 || i == 556 || i == 557 || i == 558 || i == 559 || i == 560 || i == 561 || i == 562 || i == 563 || i == 564 || i == 565 || i == 566) //runes
{
class8.anInt198 = 0;
}[/code][/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Old Platebody and Rune Models (Before 317)
item.dc:creator: @revengr revengr
item.description:
@revengr wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:3, topic:343024”]I like the look, however, I don’t care for gloves being attached to the armor. Nice find though.[/quote]Yah, I didn’t understand why they had gloves on them.
The equip models didn’t have gloves, and even if they did, there were separate gloves to begin with.
The old models give the game a sense of reminiscence though, which is nice.

Read full topic

Before the Jagex graphics team was any good. (Jk)
I actually prefer these models to the ones in 317 clients, so I put these in there.
Equip models for the platebodies had no differences, so these are just inventory models.
Platebodies include Saradomin, Guthix, Zamorak, and White Platebodies (Even though white platebodies never had sleeves like this…).

317 Default Configs don’t fit the older models…
Here are the ones that do:
